json.text:
American comic books are pretty notorious
for being pretty much made for heterosexual

teenage boys and the 90s were especially bad
about this considering that every comic was

more or less “GUNS AND MUSCLES AND GIRLS
AND MANLINESS!”, but I really want a piece

of that sweet YouTube search algorithm stuff
so I am going to pander super hardcore today,

but I also want to take a page out of my good
buddy, JWittz’s, book.

So today, let’s take a look at the Top 10
Hottest Girls in Comics!
...In no particular order...
My personal taste…
Let’s begin.

Let’s start this list off right with one
of the most iconic girls in all of comics,
Kara Zor-El A.K.A.
Supergirl.

So when you think of Kryptonians, what are
the powers that come to mind?

Super strength, flight, super breath, and
of course…
HEAT VISION!
Now THAT’S HOT!
Oh, and where does she get her powers from?
THE SUN!

If that wasn’t hot enough, Supergirl was
once a member of the Red Lantern Corps and

if you didn’t already know, one of their
defining traits is that a Red Lantern’s
blood is replaced with BURNING HOT NAPALM!
FEEL THE HEAT!
So yeah.

A lot of y’all probably didn’t know that
there was actually a female Ghost Rider for
a little while.

Alejandra Jones took over for Johnny Blaze
for a time, opting to rid the world of sin
with a surplus of firepower.

Outside of being able to generate blazing
hot hellfire on a whim, Alejandra can create

fiery weapons including scythes, chains, and
even FREAKING FIRE NUNCHUCKS!

Not only that, but her motorcycle is constantly
engulfed in flames and leaves a smoldering
trail wherever she goes.

After a short run and a fight with the demon
Mephisto in Hell, Johnny went on back to being

Ghost Rider and left Alejandra with a new
form.
Eh.
At least her head is still on fire.

As a member of the Bureau for Paranormal Research
and Defense, Liz Sherman is a prominent character
of the Hellboy series.

Liz was born with some serious firepower and
accidentally burned down an entire city block!

She’s a complete and total badass in the
field and best friends with a colossal demon
from Hell, that’s pretty damn hot.
Oh hey, speaking of hell...

Lady Blaze is the daughter of the wizard Shazam
and honestly played unimportant or background

role in comics for decades, but came back
into the spotlight for a mini-series called

Reign in Hell and HOLY CRAP THAT IS NIGHT
AND DAY!

If the name Blaze and her magic wasn’t spicy
enough, she worked to help her brother Satanus

take over all of Hell which I’m pretty sure
is like… the hottest place imaginable, but
wait!

She managed to scheme her way into stealing
the throne right from under her brother’s

feet, ruling Hell for a few years before the
New 52 came along and ruined it!

Now this one’s been a fan favorite since
kids all over the world were exposed to her
through the Teen Titans cartoon series.

Ladies and gentlemen, meet Koriand’r, better
known as Starfire!

Her trademark Starbolts are made of pure solar
energy and that’s pretty hot I guess, but

there’s girls all over this list that can
fire off energy so we need something a bit
unique that can really heat things up.

Well many of you guys might not know this
if you just watched the cartoon, but Starfire’s
hair is frequently on fire!
It’s pretty lit, fam.
So hey, you like Starfire?

Well then just flip that name around and you
have a uh… completely unrelated character,
but it was just a funny observation.
Hey look, it’s Firestar!
I hear she has pretty amazing friends.

Funnily enough, Firestar actually debuted
in that cartoon series four whole years before

being introduced into the comics, but what
makes her so hot?
Well… she controls freaking microwave energy!

Have you ever heated up lunch for way too
long in a microwave and taken a bite?

That shit’s hot! … but like, there’s
always one part of the meal that’s still
like… ice cold.
That’s not hot.
Next character.

This hottie hails from Valiant Comics, Charlene
Dupre, better known as Flamingo is a stripper

from New Orleans who grew up fascinated with
flames.

When her powers were activated by a psionic
kid named Peter, things were a bit… explosive.
Oh, that’s not what I was talking about.

She totally burned her abusive boyfriend’s
balls off.

Look, if I’m going to be completely honest,
I was literally Googling characters with the

power of pyrokinesis when I found Flamingo
and the Harbinger comic.

It’s actually a super awesome series that
I wholeheartedly recommend.
No joke here.
Just moving on.
Alright so get this.

Amara Aquilla is essentially royalty of a
long lost secret colony of the Roman Empire
in Brazil of all places.

She later joined one of the least popular
X-Men teams of all time, the New Mutants,
taking up the codename of Magma.
That name should be pretty obvious.

Move over Katniss because this girl is on
FIRE!

She’s able to control raw flames and even
magma itself!

Heck, she even has a magma form which has
to be pretty damn hot!

But of course, I’m sure there’s a much
more well known member of the X-Men that you
want me to talk about so let’s switch over.

Jean Grey is hands down one of the most iconic
characters in the X-Men’s large roster,
but that’s not why she’s on this list.
Mind reading and telekinesis?
Who cares about that?

Nah, this girl is the most iconic host of
the powerful, Phoenix Force!

This colossal fire bird is life itself and
grants its host some of the most impossible
feats of pyrokinesis in all of comics!

Like Mario, these cosmic flames can be cast
in water and even in the cold vacuum of space!
Hell, Jean’s even made a star go supernova!

Get in her way and she won’t hesitate to
burn you to a crisp.

Well… except for the fact that she’s kind
of dead…

Finally our number one is a beautiful and
well respected member of the superhero community
and… you know…
Brazilian.

Beatriz da Costa is better known by a simple,
elegant, and totally accurate alias, FIRE!

This woman is more fire than the dopest of
mix tapes and puts off a brilliant green flame.

She’s a frequent member of the Justice League
International alongside her best friend, the
frigid Tora Olafsdotter, better known as Ice.

With Ice dropping the temperature by her side,
Fire only seems hotter by comparison.
So yeah.

That was the Top 10 Hottest Girls in Comics
and before you guys go all crazy in the comments

about “OMG, THIS IS CLICKBAIT!”, that’s
not actually true.

The title and the thumbnail are completely
accurate to what the video is about so I’m
good.

I’m good on that regard, but if you like
this video then I would consider watching
another one of my videos.

They’re usually not so trolly and and they’re
usually a lot better quality in general, but

I just needed to pander a little bit to get
some views in and hopefully spark interest
in my better produced, more informative content.
So if you like it, cool.
I hope to see you on another video soon.
Okay, bye!
